snippet: A large emergency boarding center for hundreds of animals is expected to open Saturday in Brooklyn to provide up to a month of free shelter and veterinary care.
abstract: A large emergency boarding center for hundreds of animals is expected to open Saturday in Brooklyn to provide up to a month of free shelter and veterinary care.

headline.main: Some Relief for Displaced Pet Owners
